item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Lets spend the next 15 minutes creating a simple app. If you want to skip ahead and look at final code, its here: examples/tasks/main.go Prerequisites # Have you installed Go 1.18 ? If yes, we are good to go. Creating a new app # The fir library concerns itself with only the view controller so starting off is as easy as mounting a view on the fir controller: package main import ( "log" "net/http" "github.

item.title: Counter App
item.description: Lets spend the next 15 minutes creating a new reactive counter app. If you want to skip ahead and look at final code, its here: examples/counter/main.go Prerequisites # Have you installed Go ? If yes, we are good to go. Creating a new app # The fir library concerns itself with only the view controller so starting off is as easy as mounting a view on the fir controller: package main import ( "log" "net/http" "github.
